xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.7 Hetuduka, Pītittika » 1.7.3 Upekkhāsahagatapada » 1.7.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Pītittika
Upekkhāsahagatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
256.
513Hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo hetussa upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
257.
514Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
515Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
516Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
517(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
518Hetudukapītittikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetvādiup1.8 Hetuduka, Dassanenapahātabbattika >>
